action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ X X X X
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢

DESCRIPTION: The grid consists of 5 rows and 5 columns. The top four rows have the first cell empty (represented by ▢) and the remaining four cells filled (represented by X). The bottom row has all five cells empty (represented by ▢).

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ ▢
X X ▢ ▢ ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X X X X ▢
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 pattern where 'X' represents filled cells and '▢' represents empty cells. Starting from the top left corner, the first row has one 'X', the second row has two 'X's, the third row has three 'X's, the fourth row has four 'X's, and the fifth row has five 'X's.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The grid consists of 5 rows and 5 columns. The top four rows have the first cell empty (represented by ▢) and the remaining four cells filled (represented by X). The bottom row has all five cells empty (represented by ▢).

QUESTION: What is the content of the first cell in the first row of your grid?
